trans-unit.source: You are not allowed to call the action %s!
You cannot select a file, only directories!
trans-unit.target: Вы не можете выбрать файл, только папку!

trans-unit.source: This page was marked as a YAG folder. You can now start to add galleries to this folder.
No Settings for the YAG Gallery were found on the selected page.
trans-unit.target: На выбранной странице нет настроек галереи.

trans-unit.source: Please select a page where the static template for YAG is included. Or include the static template of YAG on this page.
trans-unit.target: Выберите страницу в которой включен шаблон галереи или добавьте шаблон галереи на эту страницу.

trans-unit.source: No extension configuration found for YAG.
Maybe you forgot to hit the "update" button in the extension manager. Go back to the YAG extension in the extension manager and hit the update button.
trans-unit.target: Maybe you forgot to hit the "update" button in the extension manager. Go back to the YAG extension in the extension manager and hit the update button.

trans-unit.source: It is not posible to configure your gallery on the root page.
Please select an other page in the page module to configure your gallery.
%s instances of YAG content elements are included on pages.
Clear the cache entrys of these pages.
The page cache was successfully cleared.
It seems you are currently running YAG version %s but the YAG database is a version smaller or equal %s.
ZIP upload successfull! %s items were added to your album.
trans-unit.target: Архив был закачан! Картинки были добавлены в альбом.

trans-unit.source: We're sorry. Multifile Uploader could not load. You must have JavaScript enabled to enjoy Multifile Uploading.
trans-unit.target: Упс! Ошибка загрузчика файлов. Разрешите JavaScript для правильной работы загрузчика фаилов.

trans-unit.source: SWFUpload is loading. Please wait a moment...
SWFUpload is taking a long time to load or the load has failed. Please make sure that the Flash Plugin is enabled and that a working version of the Adobe Flash Player is installed.
trans-unit.target: Выполнение загрузчика файлов заняло слишком много времени. Убедитесь что Flash Player установлен на Вашем компьютере.

trans-unit.source: We're sorry. SWFUpload could not load. You may need to install or upgrade Flash Player.
trans-unit.target: Сожалеем, но загрузчика фаилов не работает. Возможно Вам необходимо установить или обновить Flash Player.

trans-unit.source: Directory import succesfull! %s items were added to your album.
trans-unit.target: Импорт из директории завершен! Картинки добавлены в альбом.

trans-unit.source: The image resolution cache was successfully cleared.
The gallery with the UID %s has not been found!

trans-unit.target: В галерее нет ни одного альбома
Вы уверены что хотите удалить галерею %s?

trans-unit.source: There are no galleries available yet. To add your first gallery, click
There are currently no albums in your gallery. To add your first album, click
Drag and Drop albums to change sorting
trans-unit.target: Измените порядок изображений путем перетаскивания мышкой

trans-unit.source: The album with the UID %s has not been found!

trans-unit.target: Не было выбрано ни одного альбома!

trans-unit.source: Changes to albums have been saved!
Unfortunately the zip file importer is not available on your system. To activate it, install the zip php extension or configure the unzip binary in the install tool.

trans-unit.target: Ни одного изображения выбрано не было!

trans-unit.source: There are currently no images in your album. To add images, click
There are no images in this album.
Add jQuery Library: This option adds jQuery JS and CSS files. You can leave it, if the library is already included to the page.
trans-unit.target: Add jQuery Library: This option adds jQuery JS and CSS files. You can leave it, if the library is already included to the page.

trans-unit.source: Add jQuery-UI Library: This option adds jQuery-Ui JS and CSS files. You can leave it, if the library is already included to the page.
trans-unit.target: Add jQuery-UI Library: This option adds jQuery-Ui JS and CSS files. You can leave it, if the library is already included to the page.

trans-unit.source: Add fancyBox Library: This option adds FancyBox JS and CSS files. You can deactivate it, if you already included a lightBox to your page.
Insert the YAG-Gallery in your page.
No albums found in the selected gallery.
No images found in the selected gallery.
No gallery selected. Please select a gallery to display assigned albums.
trans-unit.target: No gallery selected. Please select a gallery to display assigned albums.

trans-unit.source: No album selected. Please select an album to display assigned images.
trans-unit.target: No album selected. Please select an album to display assigned images.

trans-unit.source: Custom Order (Sorting of galleries in backend)
Custom Order (Sorting of albums in backend)
Custom Order (Sorting of items in backend)
Page to jump to if image is clicked
Do you really want to delete this gallery?
trans-unit.target: Вы действительно хотите удалить эту галерею?
Вы действительно хотите удалить эту галерею?

trans-unit.source: Error while trying to delete gallery:
Sorting of galleries has been saved!
Error while trying to save sorting of galleries:
This page is not marked as a YAG folder.
Jump to a page that is marked as a YAG folder:
Mark this page as a yag sysfolder
Create yag records on this page
This is not recommended - you should rather create a sysfolder of type yag before you add yag records to this page!

trans-unit.target: Вы действительно хотите удалить этот альбом?
Вы действительно хотите удалить этот альбом?

trans-unit.target: No gallery was submitted to add the album!

trans-unit.source: Album has been set as gallery thumb!
Set this album as gallery thumb!
Sorting of album has been changed!
Do you really want to delete this image?
trans-unit.target: Вы действительно хотите удалить эту картинку?
Вы действительно хотите удалить эту картинку?

trans-unit.source: Error while trying to delete image:
Sorting of images has been saved!
Error while trying to save sorting the images:
Image has been set as album thumb!
trans-unit.target: Заставка альбома изменена на выбранную картинку!

trans-unit.source: No random image could be found for selection.
You can edit the settings for gallery here.
trans-unit.target: Здесь Вы можете редактировать настройки галереи.
Add ShaddowBox Library: This option adds ShaddowBox JS and CSS files. You can leave it, if you already included a lightBox to your page.
